channel.title: Having problems with compiler?
channel.description:
Compiler Change bolt to what version you got
@echo off title Compiling RaceMania ... color 0e echo Compiling game files ... "C:/program files/java/[b]jdk1.6.0_02[/b]/bin/javac" *.java -d . pause
Run Change bolt to what version you got
@echo off title Running ... set PATH=C:\Program files\Java\[b]jdk1.6.0_02[/b]\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
If the compiler says: No heap space left to compile. Change Xmx1024m to Xmx512m

item.title: Having problems with compiler?
item.dc:creator: @S_C_A_R_Bot S C A R Bot
item.description:
@S_C_A_R_Bot wrote:

Compiler

Change bolt to what version you got

@echo off title Compiling RaceMania ... color 0e echo Compiling game files ... "C:/program files/java/[b]jdk1.6.0_02[/b]/bin/javac" *.java -d . pause

Run
Change bolt to what version you got

@echo off title Running ... set PATH=C:\Program files\Java\[b]jdk1.6.0_02[/b]\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

If the compiler says:
No heap space left to compile.
Change Xmx1024m to
Xmx512m
